Name: Komm mit
Notes: First publication fue 6810. The piece was created in August or September 1837, when the family from Woringen spent a few weeks in Berlin as guests of the Mendelssohns. Fanny Hensel was friends with the sisters Elisa (*1807) and Rosa (*1810). Making music together played an important role.
Long Description: The piece 'Komm mit' is a terzet for soprano, alto, baritone, and piano, composed by Fanny Hensel in August or September 1837. It was during a time when the family from Woringen was visiting the Mendelssohns in Berlin. Fanny Hensel shared a close friendship with the sisters Elisa and Rosa, and their shared musical activities were significant.
Short Description: A terzet for soprano, alto, baritone, and piano by Fanny Hensel.
